io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.concurrent

Class EntropyBlockingRandomWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom
        • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.concurrent.RandomWrapper
          • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.concurrent.EntropyBlockingRandomWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteArrayReseedableRandom, EntropyCountingRandom, RepeatableRandom, Dumpable, Serializable

    public class EntropyBlockingRandomWrapper
extends RandomWrapper
    A RandomWrapper with the additional property that it won't return any output that would take its entropy below a minimum amount, and will instead either wait to be reseeded by a RandomSeederThread or, if none is installed, reseed itself on the calling thread with a SeedGenerator. If neither is present, the caller is responsible for reseeding, and any call that would reduce entropy below the minimum will throw IllegalStateException.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setRandomSeeder

        public void setRandomSeeder(@Nullable
                            SimpleRandomSeeder randomSeeder)
        Description copied from class: BaseRandom
        Registers this PRNG with the RandomSeederThread for the corresponding SeedGenerator, to schedule reseeding when we run out of entropy. Unregisters this PRNG with the previous RandomSeederThread if it had a different one.
        Overrides:
        setRandomSeeder in class BaseRandom
        Parameters:
        randomSeeder - a SeedGenerator whose RandomSeederThread will be used to reseed this PRNG, or null to stop using one.

      • creditEntropyForNewSeed

        protected void creditEntropyForNewSeed(int seedLength)
        Description copied from class: BaseRandom
        Updates the entropy count to reflect a reseeding. Sets it to the seed length or the internal state size, whichever is shorter, but never less than the existing entropy count.
        Overrides:
        creditEntropyForNewSeed in class BaseRandom
        Parameters:
        seedLength - the length of the new seed in bytes

        Overrides:

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed(long seed)
        Description copied from class: BaseRandom
        Sets the seed of this random number generator using a single long seed, if this implementation supports that. If it is capable of using 64 bits or less of seed data (i.e. if {@link #getNewSeedLength()} <= {@link Long#BYTES}), then this method shall replace the entire seed as Random.setSeed(long) does; otherwise, it shall either combine the input with the existing seed as SecureRandom.setSeed(long) does, or it shall generate a new seed using the DefaultSeedGenerator. The latter is a backward-compatibility measure and can be very slow.
        Overrides:
        setSeed in class RandomWrapper

      • needsReseedingEarly

        public boolean needsReseedingEarly()
        Description copied from interface: EntropyCountingRandom
        If true, this PRNG needs reseeding even though its entropy is positive. Added to deal with EntropyBlockingRandomWrapper.
        Returns:
        true if this PRNG needs reseeding regardless of entropy count; false otherwise
